001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.ScoreDao;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.pojo.UserScore;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
009import java.util.List;
010import javax.inject.Inject;
011import javax.inject.Singleton;
012
013@Singleton
014public class ScoreRepository {
015
016  private final ScoreDao dao;
017
018  @Inject
019  public ScoreRepository(ScoreDao dao) {
020    this.dao = dao;
021  }
022
023  public Single<Long> create(Score score) {
024    return dao.insert(score)
025        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
026  }
027
028  public Single<Integer> delete(Score score) {
029    return dao.delete(score)
030        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
031  }
032
033  public LiveData<Score> read(long id) {
034    return dao.select(id);
035  }
036
037  public LiveData<List<Score>> readAllScoresForUser(long userId) {
038    return dao.selectByPlayerId(userId);
039  }
040
041  public LiveData<List<UserScore>> readAllUserScores() {
042    return dao.selectUserScores();
043  }
044}
